game.name: 越过惊涛骇浪：水面之下
game.genres: Indie, Free To Play, Early Access
game.shortDescription: This is an interactive fiction, a narrative adventure where you play an investigator piecing together the life of a pirate. Explore journals and articles, track clues in a notebook, unlock branching paths, and uncover a story of betrayal, vengeance, and the sea.
